entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize(... JsonSerializerContext context) Ignores configurations in JsonSerializerContext #80634
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!"Missing flags on tree"' during 'Assertion prop' for recently added RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan uses #80632
    8.0.0
  • [6.0] AppleTV CI failures: Failure to launch simulator OR failure to authenticate request #80628
  • .NET 7 JIT Crash when referencing struct of particular shape: Fatal error. Internal CLR error. (0x80131506) #80624
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources (#75521) #80623
    6.0.x
  • Interop Source Generator TFM check is very expensive #80621
    8.0.0
  • Skip dotnet CLI first run logic when executing tests #80619
  • Segfault on attempt to call a Profiler API method on Linux #80617
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'GetLayout()->GetClassHandle() != NO_CLASS_HANDLE' during 'Morph - Global' #80616
  • Nested StreamWriter disposure #80606
  • HttpClientFactory holds onto exceptions indefinitely, despite a two-minute timer #80605
  • Dynamic static generic virtual method leftover work #80602
    8.0.0
  • Linq enumeration of a string's characters is twice as slow as enumerating them using string.ToCharArray() #80596
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/pauseonstart/pauseonstart/pauseonstart.sh #80594
    8.0.0
  • Proposal: evolve RyuJIT emitter to improve flexibility #80589
    Future
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208.cmd` #80588
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod.cmd` #80587
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\CollectibleAssemblies\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals.cmd` #80586
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_16833\\Test16833\\Test16833.cmd` #80585
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649.cmd` #80584
    8.0.0
  • X86 Assert failure - `baseservices\\callconvs\\TestCallingConventions\\TestCallingConventions.cmd` #80583
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro` #80582
    8.0.0

Closed

  • `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing.Matcher` matches glob pattern `/*/` against file path `/a/b`, but it shouldn't. #80076
  • EventListener unloadability #80450
    8.0.0
  • Unity 2022.2.1f1 - System.Text.Json "no viable overloaded '='" #80525
  • `runtime-coreclr jitstress-isas-x86` pipeline failing on OSX x64 #80403
  • Unhandled exception causes docker container to hang on ARM64 #66707
    8.0.0
  • Cannot load project after update to 17.4 #78237
  • Socket connect with payload via SocketAsyncEventArgs fails #79654
    7.0.x
  • [6.0] Test failures on OSX: OSVersion_ValidVersion_OSX, CurrencyNegativePattern_Get_ReturnsExpected_ByLocale #80252
  • Binding collection is not working for options in .net 7.0.1 - it is working in version 7.0.0 and below #79904
    7.0.x
  • Fix interaction of PGO and partial compilation #66101
    Future
  • JIT: resolve issues with OSR and PGO #47942
    Future
  • Vector512 tests for llvmfullaot run out of trampoline type 3 #80467
  • SerialPort ReadByte() does not longer raise the documented TimeoutException (after timeout reached) #78319
  • Running .NET 7 single file binary on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #79267
    7.0.x
  • Replace compare + brtrue/brfalse pattern with binop conditional branch (`Unsafe.IsAddressLessThan`) #80608
  • Enable functional tests for Apple platforms to have a custom native main #80545
    8.0.0
  • POST requests on ARM64 hang until timeout #80491
  • [.NET 6] BufferFileStreamStrategy fills GC Finalizer Queue #78553
    6.0.x
  • Consider deleting enum support for bool as an underlying type from all runtimes #79224
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/opt/ValueNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering/ExposedLocalsNumbering.sh #80595
  • LinqString enumeration #80593
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricEventSourceTests.EventSourceFiltersInstruments failing in CI (Outerloop) #79749
    8.0.0
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #76648
    Future
  • Is it possible for roslyn to support wasm as compiling target #77610
  • [API Proposal]: enum PARSE attribute #79699

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NET 7.0 streamed http response reading #80638
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • Update our inline observations to special case a few more intrinsics #80637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Enable partial compilation of methods #80635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Remove forward slash in trimmer args #80631
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix GC hole in newly added test #80630
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-bug, 8.0.0
  • [PERF] Fix errors from lowercase OS names #80629
    area-Infrastructure, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix some low-hanging HWIntrinsic issues #80626
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set FieldSeq in CreateSpan for field handle #80622
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512 upper regs callee #80620
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Cleanup some unused functions/headers #80618
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Ldp stp modifications flag #80614
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add support for llvm linker (lld) #80613
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Log msquic version and commit hash to event log and to test output. #80612
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Streamline TreeLifeUpdater #80611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow eliminating virtual methods on abstract classes #80607
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add type loader support for resolving static virtuals #80601
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Generate fewer templates for generic virtual methods #80600
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add additional IG assertion checking #80599
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

Merged

  • Dont produce ILLink packages from runtime til preview 2 #80627
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • Use weak handle for the back reference to EventProvider #80482
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Removing old variable debug info tracking system #80537
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] TarReader should dispose underlying stream if leaveOpen is false #80598
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Formats.Tar, 7.0.3
  • [release/6.0] [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #80615
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.14
  • [mono][aot] Simplify the dedup code. #80442
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/7.0] Remove ConcurrentDictionary from the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #80576
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.3
  • delete enum support for bool as an underlying type #79962
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make some tests use single-file publish instead of bundler API #80603
    area-Single-File
  • Use ArgumentOutOfRangeException.ThrowIf helpers in more places #80355
    area-Meta
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan (or field caching downlevel) #79461
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Enable edge based profiles for all scenarios #80481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Emit mneg for mul+neg on Arm64 #79550
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fixed Typo #80609
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Have SIMD Load/Store use GT_IND and GT_ASG where possible #80411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable specifying custom native main source with AppleAppBuilderTask #80546
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2087627 #80505
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Dispose archive stream after the list of DataStreams #80572
    area-System.Formats.Tar, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Partially fix issue caused during VS upgrade #79572
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.14
  • [release/7.0] Fix Configuration to ensure calling the property setters. #80562
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.3
  • [wasm] Move microbenchmarks, and blazor SOD runs to net8.0 #80308
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Fix security transparency issue #80478
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • PEReader doesn't work with "IsLoadedImage" and "PrefetchMetadata" options #80106
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Moving GetCurrentProcessorId() to shared #80532
    area-System.Threading
  • Make System.Collections.Immutable adhere to repo's var policy #80556
    area-System.Collections
  • Use MemoryExtensions.Equals in CharArrayHelpers.EqualsOrdinalAsciiIgnoreCase #80561
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • Add logger and tests for xml parsing in NativeAOT #80470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Set TrimMode=full for templates #80639
    area-Build-mono
  • WIP - NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Refactoring store liveness update #80539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add tests for exercising certificates with platform provider keys #80558
    area-System.Security
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Expand bblocks reordering with common patterns to facilitate propagation of values #80362
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Prevent tests from importing "normal" NuGet props/targets #80573
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • WIP: Implement native container types used by shared EventPipe code. #78852
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [TEST] DualModeSocketTest changes #80577
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • allow to set custom serial speed on Linux #80534
    os-linux, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Android] Improvements to remote certificate verification in SslStream #77386
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Rename RdXmlFile to _DirectivesFile #79926
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Changed handle table scanning so that we would scan all slots for any heap count we may have. #80541
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #80581
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
